text.description:
Wow. What a special video I have for you today. I was able to make a visit to Rules Restaurant in Covent Garden which is not only the oldest restaurant in London but also one of the world's most famous restaurants. Rules was also used in the James Bond 007 film, Spectre in 2015. Let's give it a go!
Please don't forget to like and subscribe to the channel! https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC0NBsFubVfkZNnj37i-8dBA
Merchandise: https://garyeats.com/collections/store
Website: www.garyeats.com
TikTok: https://www.tiktok.com/@garyeatsofficial Instagram: https://www.instagram.com/garyeatsofficial/ Paypal: paypal.me/garyeats
Business Enquiries: contact@garyeats.com
Equipment Used: Camera - https://amzn.to/47S3Ukw Audio - https://amzn.to/3SF3RnI | https://amzn.to/3UlTpTe Tripod - https://amzn.to/48VehVV
text.fulltitle: Reviewing LONDON'S OLDEST RESTAURANT! (Filmed in JAMES BOND!)
text.tags: Rules restaurant; rules restaurant james bond; rules restaurant review; best restaurant in london; best restaurant in london review; rules restaurant london; oldest restaurant in london; oldest restaurant in the uk; uk's oldest restaurant; restaurant review; gary eats rules; gary eats oldest restaurant; food review; gary eats food review; london restaurant; oldest restaurant; british restaurant review; spectre james bond;
